definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: Pa. alarm. dismay (so usu. Targum (not Syr.); BH [[[בָּהַל]]]);—Impf. . 3 ms. sf. [[יְבַהֲלָךְ]] Da 4:16 and Da 4:3 mpl. sf. [[לֻגַּנִי]]- Da 4:2, Da 7:15, Da 7:28 (both juss. Str:§ 18 c M:§ 52 a); [[לוּח]]- Da 5:10, [[לֻנֵּ֑ךְ]]- Da 4:16, [[לוּנֵהּ]]- Da 5:6.

definitions.title: Hithpe.
definitions.body: hasten (so Pi. in late BH; Targum Ithpe. (rare)); Inf. [[בְּהִתְבְּהָלָה]] = in haste (orig. ‘in alarm’) Da 2:25, Da 3:24, Da 6:20.

definitions.title: Hithpa.
definitions.body: Pt. pass. [[מִתְבָּהַל]] Da 5:9 was greatly alarmed.
